etymology.description: 爪(爪) (zhǎo, "claw") + 大(大) (dà, "big") + 幺(幺) (yāo, "small/slender") = hand grabbing a slave by braids -> "what"
etymology.interpretation: The character 奚 originally depicted a hand grabbing a slave by their braids, symbolizing control or questioning, which evolved into the meaning "what" as a form of interrogative or questioning expression.
